title: FT/FS: T201 lot with Mordecai Brown - TRADED!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FT/FS: T201 lot with Mordecai Brown - TRADED!
posts.post_content:
**SORRY, BUT THESE HAVE NOW BEEN TRADED!**

I have these T201s available:

1911 T201 Double Folders:
M. Brown HOF/Hofman F/G
Ford/Johnson P/F
Hartzell/Blair F/G
Killian/Fitzpatrick G/VG
LaPorte/Stephens G/VG
McCabe/Starr VG (but "19" written small in pen). Factory No. 30
Wiltse/Merkle VG

I'd prefer a HOFer or two from just about any other prewar set that I can use, or perhaps some '50s stuff as well in trade.  Or I might consider selling. 

Jimi
